properties.entry: SELECT A.HP_CMT_NO , A.HP_CMT_CONTENT , A.HP_CMT_MEM_NO , A.MEM_NAME , A.HP_REF_BOARD_NO , A.HP_PARENT_CMT_NO , A.HP_WRITE_TIME FROM (SELECT B.HP_CMT_NO , B.HP_CMT_CONTENT , B.HP_CMT_MEM_NO , C.MEM_NAME , B.HP_REF_BOARD_NO , B.HP_PARENT_CMT_NO , B.HP_WRITE_TIME FROM HOSPITAL_CMT B JOIN MEM_INFO C ON(B.HP_CMT_MEM_NO = C.MEM_NO) ORDER BY B.HP_CMT_NO DESC ) A WHERE A.HP_REF_BOARD_NO = ?
